name: I hate toasters
description:
In the 2084, a company called A.T.T.T was selling toasters, that kills their owners when they are in an unprotected state. Fixie Hartmann, a survivor of the toaster attack plans on taking down the company by destroying  everything protecting them. Join Fixie on her quest to break the protection in this 2D top down action game made for the fireside 2022 jam!

credits:

Iggy Lonely (pixel artist for ingame sprites, programmer, level designer and game designer)

ND (Character designer of Fixie Hartmann and her friend Anita Dickenme)

El Nyrox (Composer and artist behind the cover/splash screen)

Gate (Ambience sound designer)

all other sound effects are made with sfxr.
